turn.0: ELI5: How can living organisms be alive if they are composed of non living atoms?
turn.1: It reacts to water, heat, oxygen etc.reacts the same way a bacteria does.
turn.2: Saying that fire responds to stimuli such as water which results in it being put out is like saying that humans respond to stimuli such as decapitation which results in death
turn.3: How else would a human know they are dead. Some Crystals also exhibit all 7 characteristics.
turn.4: What magical land do you come from where fire and crystals are living things
turn.5: Have you never grown a copper sulfate crystal? It's exhibits all the characteristics of life.
turn.6: As a matter of fact I have never grown a copper sulfate crystal I don't really do chem experiments in my spare time
